Stayed away from the alcohol, stayed away from the destructive tools we learn to use. the smoking and the starving, the running, the madness,thinking it will help but it only feeds the fireand I don't want to hurt myself anymore.I made it through and today I woke up, lighter and proud because I'm still here. There are flowers growing outside my window. The coffee is warm, the air is pure. In a few hours I'll be on a train on my way to sing for people who invited me to come, to sing, for them. My own songs, that I created. Me—little me. From nowhere at all. And I have people around that I like and can laugh with, and it's spring again. It will always be spring again.And there will always be a new day.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: When God takes out the trash, don't go digging back through it. Trust Him.
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana, Heart Crush

quote: Unlike many other journeys, when it comes to finding self and matters of the heart you'll swiftly find yourself lost if you follow someone else's
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: A thousand happy moments succumbed to history. It was the happiest hour of the year, worst time of our lives. I can still smell the ruins from that cold dark brute stormy October night.
author: Parul Wadhwa, The Masquerade

quote: You're only as good as your last thought of yourself.
author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quote: In love madly,traveling though thelife-raft's unravelingin a beautiful tragedy,but gladly i'm stillpaddling throughthe oceanof youranatomy.
author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quote: Don't change yourself for anyone, you may struggle a lot to do so... When you are completely changed, people wants the old one to get back again, which would be a difficult task ever for you...
author: Giridhar Alwar, My Quest For Happy Life

quote: Though no one can backtrack and create a brand new start, Everyone is capable of taking their life in a brand new direction.
author: Germany Kent

quote: LIFE - Death's Very Emissary
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KARMA

quote: The best piece of life's magnificence is your slice of internal peace.
author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

quote: Frustration... when our happiness or sadness looses control. The blissful intensity of sensations, the disappointing realisation that dissatisfaction is not enough.
author: Strohberry

quote: We bring happiness into the world one day at a time by accepting pain and returning understanding and compassion.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: A house is never small or empty, when filled with love.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: At the end of the day, you control your happiness at peace.
author: Napz Cherub Pellazo

quote: Every time I tried kissing happiness, it came very close to me and then pushed me away.
author: Toffee, Finding Juliet

quote: I believe adopting free unstructured play, within an appropriate framework, has rich potential in bringing up happy, well-balanced and resilient children.
author: Iben Dissing Sandahl, The Danish Way of Parenting: What the Happiest People in the World Know About Raising Confident, Capable Kids

quote: Life goes on without regard to our whims. What we make of life is what counts, how we address the challenges in our lives determines our respective levels of personal accomplishment and happiness.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: Happiness...I see you..You are that wave that comes and goes...always fast...and always leaving a gap behind...
author: Viorica Dragotel

quote: To be truly happy, a man must live absolutely in the present, no thought of what's gone before and no thought of what lies ahead. But a life with meaning, a man is condemned to wallow in the past and obsess about the future.
author: Daniel Linderman

quote: A person who is fearful of generously loving other people is already half dead. Loving another person brings out the courage in all of us to live a heightened existence, the inner resolve to map out a course of action and follow it to the end. Just as importantly, love awakens us to the knowledge that personal happiness comes not from achieving some corporal objective, but from the quality of thoughts that accompany a person.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: My level of excitement is above cricket proportions
author: C.S. Woolley

quote: True Success is about A Winners Heart-Mind-set that enables, energizes and empowers Leadership and SWIFT Actions that Ensure REAL Success and Sustained Long-Term Freedom, Love, Abundance, Peace, Meaning and Joy.” ― Tony "Success Activator" Dovale
author: ― Tony "Success Activator" Dovale

quote: As Technology Revolutionizes the Workplace, we must Revolutionise our thinking to make the Workplace a HUMANE and GREAT place to Work.. or we will surely lose our Souls to business profiteers.
author: ― Tony "Success Activator" Dovale

quote: A Revolutionary, High-Performance, Workplace is one where the culture is Consciously Constructive. That is EVERYONE is developed, on a daily basis, towards their full potential, to achieve exponential impacts and results, supporting People, Planet & Profits.
author: ― Tony "Success Activator" Dovale

quote: A Consciously Constructive organisation must equally balance the 6 Proven aspects of a High Performance Workplace using the proven CLEARx framework. Philosophy and System.
author: ― Tony "Success Activator" Dovale

quote: He told me that the phrase “the happiest days of your life” referred to your school days.This seemed nonsensical to me then, and I suspected it of being either adult propaganda or, more likely, confirmation of my creeping suspicion that the majority of adults actually had no memories of being children.
author: Neil Gaiman, The View from the Cheap Seats: Selected Nonfiction

quote: If a city is designed in a way that makes a long drive to work necessary, we harm the social health of that city. If a lot of people cycle, it's probably an indication that you live in a healthy neighborhood. This is something that should be seriously considered in urban planning, if you want to ensure a neighborhood togetherness and trust among locals.
author: Meik Wiking, The Little Book of Hygge: Danish Secrets to Happy Living

quote: Not for the first time I find our lives are a shadow, and I am not afraid to say that people who think they have everything figured out and are masters of logic - they are responsible for the greatest folly. No human being is happy. Strike it rich and you are luckier than your neighbor - but happy, never.
author: Euripides, Medea

quote: True happiness comes when you give your best in something beyond yourself.
author: Jeffrey Fry

quote: They leave Omelas, they walk ahead into the darkness, and they do not come back. The place they go towards is a place even less imaginable to most of us than the city of happiness. I cannot describe it at all. It is possible that it does not exist. But they seem to know where they are going, the ones who walk away from Omelas.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin, The Ones Who Walk Away from Omelas

quote: Everybody needs to be good-natured with a good heart, because in this way we can solve our own problems as well as those of others, and we can make our human life meaningful.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KARMA

quote: We do not recognize that we are addicted to some negative psychological habit, some terribly self-destructive patterns of thinking...
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KARMA

quote: We are living a fantasy life in our heads, and our real life is passing by, moment by moment.Life is only lived in moments: anything else is a fantasy, a lie, an illusion.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KARMA

quote: Oh, child, my child, if only you realized who you truly are.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: Karma is a balance sheet of life which debits and credit all your deeds.YourWhich is audited by our creator and actions are based on what we accumulated in it.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KARMA

quote: Karma is the balance sheet of life which debits and credit all your deeds.YourWhich is audited by our creator and actions are based on what we accumulated in it.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KARMA

quote: We create karma by all kinds of selfish actions.The first thing we must understand is that we are psychologically asleep.It is very difficult for us to be conscious of ourselves. We are not very aware. We must come to recognize that we do not pay attention.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KARMA

quote: Self-observation is simply the observation of an internal state and an external event. It is pure awareness, which gives one the ability to choose one's actions. Only by having the choice can one perform what is right.
author: Abhysheq Shukla

quote: Desires and Karma are the worst enemies living in the same soul together. It depends on us whom we choose and feed.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, KARMA

quote: If you have enjoyed something, but have never experienced joy, then u have not really been happy
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: They all know it is there, all the people of Omelas. Some of them have come to see it, others are content merely to know it is there. They all know that it has to be there. Some of them understand why, and some do not, but they all understand that their happiness, the beauty of their city, the tenderness of their friendships, the health of their children, the wisdom of their scholars, the skill of their makers, even the abundance of their harvest and the kindly weathers of their skies, depend wholly on this child's abominable misery.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin, The Ones Who Walk Away from Omelas

quote: The best days in the life of any person are the days of joy
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: They leave Omelas, they walk ahead into thedarkness, and they do not come back. The place they go towards is a place even less imaginable to most of us than the city of happiness. I cannot describe it at all. It is possible that it does not exist. But they seem to know where they are going, the ones who walk away from Omelas.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin, The Ones Who Walk Away from Omelas: A Story

quote: ...nothing is more dangerous than solitude: there our imagination, always disposed to rise, taking a new flight on the wings of fancy, pictures to us a chain of beings of whom we seem the most inferior. All things appear greater than they really are, and all seem superior to us. This operation of the mind is quite natural: we so continually feel our own imperfections, and fancy we perceive in others the qualities we do not possess, attributing to them also all that we enjoy ourselves, that by this process we form the idea of a perfect, happy man,—a man, however, who only exists in our own imagination.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, The Sorrows of Young Werther

quote: Miracles happen when dreamers take action.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: Don’t you dare focus your energy on the 99 reasons something can’t be done. Focus on the one thing you can do and the 99 won’t matter.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: Dreamers Can.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: The world is yours the moment you follow your own dreams.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: Dreams grow bigger and bolder every time you nourish them.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: A thought enters your brain and lasts an average of five seconds. The only way to keep it is to grab hold of it and claim it. The same applies to dreams. We forget most of our dreams because we never take the actions needed to make them our own.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: Humility and Dignity had a daughter, called Arrogance, who was ashamed of her name and used to hide behind Pride. But Pride was in love with Truth, therefore arrogance married Illusion and forever despised Truth. Pride and Truth had a daughter, called Happiness, while Arrogance and Illusion had a son, called Despair. When both meet, one of them cries.
author: Robin Sacredfire

quote: Think good for yourself ,good will follow you.when you think good for others ,happiness will follow you and when happiness follows you, people will follow you.
author: irrfan ishaq

quote: Happiness is just like a glacier-the visible one eighth tip sitting on seven eighth mass of pain and suffering under the surface
author: Shahid H. Raja

quote: As far as I’m concerned, eighteen holes of golf is the only happiness that money can buy. - Momofuku Ando
author: Andy Raskin

quote: If you do not have Joy, there will be nothing for you to remember
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Happiness does not mean being free from problems and trials, but finding purpose in problems and trials can result in abundant happiness.
author: Hank Smith

quote: Happily ever after doesn’t just happen because you’ve found the love of your life. Happiness is a personal choice.
author: Tracie Sage, The Missing Manual to Love, Marriage and Intimacy: A Proactive Path to Happily Ever After

quote: What if Happily Ever After is a path you can choose and not The End?
author: Tracie Sage, The Missing Manual to Love, Marriage and Intimacy: A Proactive Path to Happily Ever After

quote: When no possessions keep us, when no countries contain us, and no time detains us, man becomes a heroic wanderer, and woman, a wanderess.
author: Roman Payne, The Wanderess

quote: What is a Wanderess? Bound by no boundaries, contained by no countries, tamed by no time, she is the force of nature’s course.
author: Roman Payne, The Wanderess

quote: Happiness is a delightful heart.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: We mustn't let next week rob us of this week's joy.
author: L.M. Montgomery, Anne of the Island

quote: Just because your life isn't as awful as someone else's that doesn't mean it doesn't suck. You can't compare how you feel to the way other people feel. It just doesn't work.What might look like the perfect life - or even an okay life - to you might not be so okay for the person living it.
author: Michael Thomas Ford, Suicide Notes

quote: They said she could not do it. But she didn’t listen so when she did it. And when they stood in awe, she did not hear their applause. The only validation she needed came from the voice inside her head. The voice that had always been there saying, “You got this.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: People settle for a level of despair they can tolerate and call it happiness.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: You are wrong if you think you cannot live without love, Edith.''No, I am not,' she said, slowly. 'I cannot live without it. Oh, I do not mean that I go into a decline, develop odd symptoms, become a caricature. I mean something far more serious than that. I mean that I cannot live well without it. I cannot think or act or speak or write or even dream with any kind of energy in the absence of love. I feel excluded from the living world. I become cold, fish-like, immobile. I implode. My idea of absolute happiness is to sit in a hot garden all day, reading or writing, utterly safe in the knowledge that the person I love will come home to me in the evening. Every evening.''You are a romantic, Edith,' repeated Mr Neville, with a smile.'It is you who are wrong,' she replied. 'I have been listening to that particular accusation for most of my life. I am not a romantic. I am a domestic animal. I do not sigh and yearn for extravagant displays of passion, for the grand affair, the world well lost for love. I know all that, and know that it leaves you lonely. No, what I crave is the simplicity of routine. An evening walk, arm in arm, in fine weather. A game of cards. Time for idle talk. Preparing a meal together.
author: Anita Brookner, Hotel du Lac

quote: Life is the night skyAll the dots of stars are happiness
author: Richard L.  Ratliff

quote: If I could bottle this exact feeling I have right now, and sell it, I'd make millions." I said to Chet"Well, unfortunately for you, but luckily for every other adult, someone already has. They called it alcohol.
author: Keith Buckley, Scale: A Novel

quote: The self is a subjective entity created by our thoughts and deeds. All sense of happiness and emotional wellbeing turns upon how a person organizes their stream of consciousness into a creation and development of a positive or negative self-image.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls

quote: While I was not entirely satisfied with the circumstances of my existence, I felt like the possibility of improvement still existed. That I could make happiness happen.
author: Marcy Dermansky, The Red Car

quote: We each own our own happiness.My contentment is no one else’s responsibility.My joy is mine to protect and nourish.If we are incapable of reaching inward and embracing that which makes us happy, then perhaps we don’t deserve it. But if we find our joy, we should be diligent to pursue it, cultivate it and share it.
author: LaShawnda Jones

quote: Families are so beautiful. Wherever we may be, looking at kids and happy families make us feel like home.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Just as there is a moment when the artist must stop, when the sculpture must be left as it is, the painting untouched—just as a determination not to know serves the maker more than all the resources of clairvoyance—so there must be a minimum of ignorance in order to perfect a life in happiness. Thosewho lack such a thing must set about acquiring it: unintelligence must be earned.
author: Albert Camus, A Happy Death

quote: Actually, before creating a family, it is necessary for a person to be already happy
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Scrub your brain of any thoughts that don’t serve you, and to fill your mind with fresh, clean thinking that instills confidence, commitment, and ultimate success.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: Happiness will never come to those who fail to appreciate what they already have.
author: Chuck Bridges

quote: A dark thought will never lead you to the light because darkness is terrified of light.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse

quote: The more happiness you put out into the world, the more will find its way back to you. If I can make one person’s day better because of my actions, it’s been a good day for everyone
author: If I Wake

quote: The greatest gift of life is being wealthy with happiness.
author: Aloysius Jnr

quote: When God said 'Let there be light'.May be he meant it Inside.
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: No hay felicidad más grande que la que sientes al ayudar a los demás.
author: Maya Benmergui

quote: Жаль того глупца, кто видит жизнь как войну. Отвоевывать что-либо, а тем более счастье, бессмысленно. Драгоценный камень, добытый борьбой, превратится в кусок обычной глины. Счастье не находят, его создают
author: Эльчин Сафарли

quote: In a relationship, prudent application of the gray theory is a key ingredient in assuring years of happiness; “till death do us part”. Balance is at the center of success, satisfaction and a lifetime of love.
author: Carlos Wallace, The Other 99 T.Y.M.E.S: Train Your Mind to Enjoy Serenity

quote: Only you are responsible for your life and for your life and making it a happy life
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: there are signs to find ,understand person who is in love _ in little of sickness or in little success ,or failure ,their eyes ,and heart looks for their lovers .this is for both ,to understand depth of human relationship is so strong bonded .
author: litymunshi

quote: there are signs to find ,understand person who is in love _ in little of sickness or in little success ,or failure ,their eyes ,and heart looks for their lovers .this is for both ,to understand depth of human relationship.which is so strong bonded .
author: litymunshi

quote: Live with God, have faith in God – it is true happiness
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: No matter what each day brings -- the trials and tribulations that may cross my path, the turmoil, the ugliness -- when I look at this picture I'm reminded that life is precious and there is still beauty in this world.
author: Ryan Troske, The Rising

quote: When a soothing wind blows gently love through the thistledown of expectations, hope may inveigle the future for timeless care and tenderness to be anchored in a bay of good luck. ("Happiness blowing in the wind" )
author: Erik Pevernagie

quote: Beauty is not a warrant for wellbeing and so does happiness not hinge on social success, but is only tangible via intricate, meandering discovery journeys in the mind. ("Absence of beauty was like hell")
author: Erik Pevernagie

quote: I don't trust anybody who isn't a little bit neurotic
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: Life is a useless passion, an exciting journey of a mammal in survival mode. Each day is a miracle, a blessing unexplored and the more you immerse yourself in light, the less you will feel the darkness. There is more to life than nothingness. And cynicism. And nihilism. And selfishness. And glorious isolation. Be selfish with yourself, but live your life through your immortal acts, acts that engrain your legacy onto humanity. Transcend your fears and follow yourself into the void instead of letting yourself get eaten up by entropy and decay. Freedom is being yourself without permission. Be soft and leave a lasting impression on everybody you meet
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: Your fear of becoming a cliche is what turns you into one. If you remove the fear, we are all really walking contradictions, hypocrites and paradoxical cliches
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: But that wasn't what happened. What happened was they drove to Harry's and parked the Camaro next to an Audi and a Lexus and Gansey ordered flavors of gelato until the table wouldn't hold anymore and Ronan convinced the staff to turn the overhead speakers up and Blue laughed for the first time at something Gansey said and they were loud and triumphant and kings of Henrietta, because they'd found the ley line and because it was starting, it was starting.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Raven Boys

quote: You are not always right. It’s not always about being right. The best thing you can offer others is understanding. Being an active listener is about more than just listening, it is about reciprocating and being receptive to somebody else. Everybody has woes. Nobody is safe from pain. However, we all suffer in different ways. So learn to adapt to each person, know your audience and reserve yourself for people who have earned the depths of you
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: She quite liked this aspect of her personality, the way her mood could change from melancholy to euphoric because of a breeze or a flavor or a beautiful chord progression. It meant she never had to feel too down about feeling down.
author: Liane Moriarty, Truly Madly Guilty

quote: I am a habitual rule-breaker
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: Vulnerability is the least celebrated emotion in our society
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: You can never catch real happiness without making others happy!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Happiness is the purpose of humans so it must need to be for the good of others otherwise one’s happiness could hurt many others.
author: Zaman Ali, Humanity

quote: I have been at war with parts of myself for so long
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: There might not be a measure of happiness left in a life, but there could be beauty and grace and endless love.
author: Peter Heller, Celine

quote: Happiness is the sense that my life is good because my biological needs are being met. Meaning is the sense that my life is significant because it has met the needs of another. Happiness bestows the feeling that I am whole. Meaning bestows the feeling that I matter and am valued. Happiness is an event, and meaning is a state. Happiness is the means to an end; meaning is an end in itself. Happiness fades; meaning accumulates.
author: James Castleton, MD, Mending of a Broken Heart

quote: All my life I have heard the term happiness thrown around like a buzzword as if it is something to be gained. As I have previously expressed, I do not view happiness as a tangible thing. To me happinesss is the elimination of accumulated darkness. Self-sustaining happiness comes from contentment of acceptance, compassion and sympathetic joy, qualities which cannot be developed like a muscle, but rather they must be actualized by the removal of fetters in the mind
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: Because I did not understand the difference between meaning and happiness, I did not appreciate that life could be meaningful without being happy. I didn’t understand that meaning and happiness are occasionally opposed, such that the self-sacrifice that yields meaning may come at the cost of the very things on which happiness most depends. I erroneously assumed that if I were unhappy then my life lacked significance.
author: James Castleton, MD, Mending of a Broken Heart

quote: Faith is not to believe Or pray that Providence Will help a chieve Anything we want, But to liv eWith confidence That God will do for us Everything we need.
author: Ana Claudia Antunes, A-Z of Happiness: Tips for Living and Breaking Through the Chain that Separates You from Getting That Dream Job

quote: A Happiness key: Maintain something to be enthusiastic about. Small/frequent goals = Dopamine hits that propel success.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Attachment and Expectations are the two biggest killer elements of happiness in everyone's life.Learn the art to monitor and control these killers to bring happiness back in your LIFE!!!
author: Santosh Adbhut Kumar

quote: I take it as a compliment when somebody calls me crazy. I would be offended if I was one of the sheeple, one of the sleepwalkers in the matrix or part of the collective hallucination we call 'normal
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: Eleven reasons you want to become a robot: 1. Robots are logical and know their purpose.2. Robots have programming they understand.3. Robots are not held to unattainable standards and then criticized when they fail.4. Robots are not crippled by emotions they don't know how to process.5. Robots are not judged based on what sex organs they were born with.6. Robots have mechanical bodies that are strong and durable. They are not required to have sex.7. Robots do not feel guilt (about existing, about failing, about being something other than expected).8. Robots can multitask.9. Robots do not feel unsafe all the time.10. Robots are perfect machines that are capable and functional and can be fixed if something breaks.11. Robots are happy.
author: A. Merc Rustad, The Best American Science Fiction and Fantasy 2015

quote: Thoroughly selfish individuals can be entirely happy. They will be unlikely to find life very meaningful. To such individuals, meaning often seems accidental, coincidental, or tangential … The reason this is so is that selfish people will find life meaningful only when they are not themselves; when they forget their selfish desires and act in a manner more consistent with agape (selfless love). Meaning seems accidental, coincidental or tangential to their lives because, by and large, selflessness is accidental, coincidental and tangential to their lives. There is nothing unpredictable about meaning, only the presence of selflessness in the life of a selfish person.
author: James Castleton, MD, Mending of a Broken Heart

quote: The major dilemma in life arises when it is assumed that meaning is simply a greater degree of happiness, such that the more one indulges physiological needs, the more likely it is that life will be experienced as meaningful.
author: James Castleton, MD, Mending of a Broken Heart

quote: Happiness is true, even though it fades, and meaning is also true, despite the fact that it endures. Those experiences that define what it most means to be human are true not because they endure, they are true because they are meaningful. Being human is not about being happy, not because happiness fades, but because the apex of the human experience is not happiness but meaning. Meaning endures not because it is true but because it is not dependent on circumstance. Happiness is transient not because it is false but precisely because it is dependent on circumstance. Each emotional experience is true in its proper domain. What makes one fleeting and the other lasting is not truth but the fact that one belongs to the temporal and the other to the eternal.
author: James Castleton, MD, Mending of a Broken Heart

quote: A man came to Budha and said, "I want happiness". Budha replied" Remove 'I", its your ego,Remove "want" its you source of misery, Now you are left with "happiness".
author: DrDLN

quote: Happiness fades by design, precisely because it’s a means to an end, not an end in itself. We continually need to meet our psychological, emotional, and physical needs to remain healthy. If one meal were enough to provide lasting happiness, we would slowly starve to death afterward … Consequently, there’s a limit to our happiness, which is defined by the amount required to satisfy a biological need. Exceed this amount, and the result isn’t more happiness but the discomfort and disease that follow from overindulgence. While some may be good, more isn’t necessarily better, and too much of a good thing can be a bad thing.
author: James Castleton, MD, Mending of a Broken Heart

quote: Many of us humans have a hard time with understanding one simple truth: the surest way to get love is to start giving love to others. Often, when we desperately need some companionship, understanding and warmth from those who are around us, we chose to blame, shout, criticize, accuse, insult and set ultimatums. But in reply, we only encounter with cold walls of estrangement which was diligently built by our own efforts, farcical walls and fences.
author: Sahara Sanders, INDIGO DIARIES: A Series of Novels

quote: Unfortunately, wisdom and happiness are old enemies, and where one can be found, the other seldom lingers. - Wollof
author: Joseph Lallo

quote: Unfortunately, wisdom and happiness are old enemies, and where one can be found, the other seldom lingers. - Wolloff
author: Joseph R. Lallo, The Book of Deacon

quote: In the architecture of their life some may display Potemkin happiness in view of hiding the dark features of their fair weather relationship, preferring to set up a window dressing of fake satisfaction rather than being rejected as emotional outcasts. ("Absence of beauty was like hell")
author: Erik Pevernagie

quote: He was no god, just an artist; and when an artist is a man, he needs a woman to create like a god.
author: Roman Payne

quote: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: Gratitude turns disappointment into lessons learned, discoveries made, alternatives explored, and new plans set in motion.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: Happiness is not a destination. It cannot be bought, sold or traded. Happiness is the gift of the journey.
author: Lisa Cypers Kamen, Are We Happy Yet?: Eight Keys to Unlocking a Joyful Life

quote: We sat talking on a rock. The air was filled with the tang of sea-weed and of something else that could only have been the ocean smell. I felt so happy that I wasn't even afraid it wouldn't last.
author: Tove Jansson, Moominpappa's Memoirs

quote: There is a whole world out there waiting to have fun. Show them how it's done!
author: Gary Rudz

quote: Open your eyesOpen your earsOpen your mindOpen your heartThey are your portals to joy
author: Lisa Cypers Kamen, Are We Happy Yet?: Eight Keys to Unlocking a Joyful Life

quote: Those who are truly grateful are deeply moved by the privilege of living.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: Even so have I given the womb of the earth to those that be sown in it in their times.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Gratitude is a miracle of its own recognition. It brings out a sense of appreciation and sincerity of a being.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: Happiness waits for no one.
author: Lisa Cypers Kamen, Are We Happy Yet?: Eight Keys to Unlocking a Joyful Life

quote: The achievement of a happy life is not only positively good for us, it is constructively good for those around us.
author: Lisa Cypers Kamen, Are We Happy Yet?: Eight Keys to Unlocking a Joyful Life

quote: Authentic happiness is not selfish, egotistical or narcissistic, in fact, it is essential in order for humankind to thrive
author: Lisa Cypers Kamen, Are We Happy Yet?: Eight Keys to Unlocking a Joyful Life

quote: Happiness is being at home your own skin and being able to occupy your life.
author: Lisa Cypers Kamen, Are We Happy Yet?: Eight Keys to Unlocking a Joyful Life

quote: Sustainable happiness is important, because it not only elevate our own wellbeing locally, but also contributes to collective global flourishing.
author: Lisa Cypers Kamen, Are We Happy Yet?: Eight Keys to Unlocking a Joyful Life

quote: For the grateful, there is no room for disappointment; Each moment offers life.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: Happiness will never invite you to the party. Happiness simply comes down to a choice to show up each and every day on the world with passion, purpose, place and meaning.
author: Lisa Cypers Kamen, Are We Happy Yet?: Eight Keys to Unlocking a Joyful Life

quote: They that be born in the strength of youth are of one fashion, and they that are born in the time of age, when the womb fail, are otherwise.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Seeing thou hast now given me the way, I will proceed to speak before thee: for our mother, of whom thou hast told me that she is young, draw now nigh unto age.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Like as a young child may not bring forth the things that belong to the aged, even so have I disposed the world which I created.
author: Compton Gage

quote: What betrayed me? Was it my heart? Or my Soul?
author: Compton Gage

quote: You do not love me
author: you love my success!

quote: HAPPINESS is something when you stop overthinking everything. Let all flow
author: Diadjeng Laraswati H

quote: Do everything which could make you happy
author: Diadjeng Laraswati H

quote: Stop seeking their approval and validation. The only opinion that should and will ever matter is your own, nobody else deserves to have that much control over the outcome of your life. Do what makes you happy, fearlessly.
author: Keysha Jade, Major Awakening

quote: Some things are too good. They make everything else worthless.
author: Mohsin Hamid, Moth Smoke

quote: Since I can remember, for some reason, I was always “not like others,” and it was presented by everyone like there was something wrong with me; only becoming more grown up and mature, I realized that to be special and different from the crowd is my biggest value and happiness.
author: Sahara Sanders, INDIGO DIARIES: A Series of Novels

quote: Holiness doesn’t demand denial of happiness, only selfishness. Where unhappiness exists in a relationship, I would submit that such isn’t the price of holiness but a sign of sin. It is an indication that one or both partners is holding to the wrong value system, that of self-love. When husbands and wives love each other with agape, they meet the deepest needs God designed to be met in the very manner He intended. The result is a joy that is complete and a relationship where happiness is the fruit of holiness and meaning is the consequence of a loving relationship.
author: —James Castleton, MD, Mending of a Broken Heart

quote: Stand up upon the right side, and I shall expound the similitude unto thee.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Consider with thyself; as the rain is more than the drops, and as the fire is greater than the smoke; but the drops and the smoke remain behind: so the quantity which is past did more exceed.
author: Compton Gage

quote: As for the tokens whereof thou ask me, I may tell thee of them in part: but as touching thy life, I am not sent to shew thee.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Iniquity shall be increased above that which now thou see, or that thou hast heard long ago.
author: Compton Gage

quote: The land, that thou see now to have root, shall thou see wasted suddenly.
author: Compton Gage

quote: If the most High grant thee to live, thou shall see after the third trumpet that the sun shall suddenly shine again in the night, and the moon thrice in the day:
author: Compton Gage

quote: Blood shall drop out of wood, and the stone shall give his voice, and the people shall be troubled:
author: Compton Gage

quote: He shall rule, whom they look not for that dwell upon the earth, and the fowls shall take their flight away together:
author: Compton Gage

quote: The Sodomy sea shall cast out fish, and make a noise in the night, which many have not known: but they shall all hear the voice thereof.
author: Compton Gage

quote: There shall be confusion also in many places, and the fire shall be oft sent out again, and the wild beasts shall change their places, and menstruate women shall bring forth monsters:
author: Compton Gage

quote: Salt waters shall be found in the sweet, and all friends shall destroy one another; then shall wit hide itself, and understanding withdraw itself into his secret chamber-
author: Compton Gage

quote: One land also shall ask another, and say, ‘Is righteousness that makes a man righteous gone through thee?’ And it shall say, ‘No.
author: Compton Gage

quote: At the same time shall men hope, but nothing obtain: they shall labor, but their ways shall not prosper.
author: Compton Gage

quote: To shew thee such tokens I have leave; and if thou wilt pray again, and weep as now, and fast even days, thou shall hear yet greater things.
author: Compton Gage

quote: An extreme fearfulness moves through all your body, and your mind is troubled more.
author: Compton Gage

quote: After seven days of fasten so it was, that the thoughts of my heart were very grievous unto me- and my soul recovered the spirit of understanding.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Hear me, and I will instruct thee; hearken to the thing that I say, and I shall tell thee more.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Thou art sore troubled in mind for the people in the world’s sake: loves thou that people better than he that made them?
author: Compton Gage

quote: Number me the things that are not yet come- gather me together the dross that are scattered abroad- make me the flowers green again that are withered- Open me the places that are closed, and bring me forth the winds that in them are shut up- shew me the image of a voice: and then I will declare to thee the thing that thou labor to know.
author: Compton Gage

quote: O Lord that bear rule, who may know these things, but he that had not his dwelling with men?
author: Compton Gage

quote: As for you, you're unwise: how may you then speak of these things whereof thou ask you?
author: Compton Gage

quote: Like as thou canst do none of these things that I have spoken of, even so canst thou not find out my judgment, or in the end the love that I have promised unto my people.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Behold, O Lord, yet art thou nigh unto them that be reserved till the end: and what shall they do that have been before me, or we that be now, or they that shall come after us?
author: Compton Gage

quote: I will liken my judgment unto a ring: like as there is no slackness of the last, even so there is no swiftness of the first.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Could thou not make those that have been made, and be now, and that are for to come, at once; that thou might shew thy judgement the sooner?
author: Compton Gage

quote: The creature may not haste above the maker
author: neither may the world hold them at once that shall be created therein.

quote: As thou hast said unto thy servant, that thou, which gives life to all, hast given life at once to the creature that thou hast created, and the creature bare it: even so it might now also bear them that now be present at once.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Ask the womb of a woman, and say unto her, If thou bring forth children, why dost thou it not together, but one after another? pray her therefore to bring forth ten children at once.
author: Compton Gage

quote: She cannot: but must do it by distance of time.
author: Compton Gage

quote: How my adventures become your sins?
author: Compton Gage

quote: Go thy way, weigh me the weight of the fire, or measure me the blast of the wind, or call me again the day that is past.
author: Compton Gage

quote: What man is able to do that, that thou should ask such things of me?
author: Compton Gage

quote: If I should ask thee how great dwellings are in the midst of the sea, or how many springs are in the beginning of the deep, or how many springs are above the firmament, or which are the outgoings of paradise: Peradventure thou would say unto me, ‘I never went down into the deep, nor as yet into hell, neither did I ever climb up into heaven.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Nevertheless now have I asked thee but only of the fire and wind, and of the day where-through thou hast passed, and of things from which thou canst not be separated, and yet canst thou give me no answer of them.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Thine own things, and such as are grown up with thee, canst thou not know; How should thy vessel then be able to comprehend the way of the Highest, and, the world being now outwardly corrupted to understand the corruption that is evident in my sight?
author: Compton Gage

quote: It were better that we were not at all, than that we should live still in wickedness, and to suffer, and not to know wherefore.
author: Compton Gage

quote: I went into a forest into a plain, and the trees took counsel- And said, Come, let us go and make war against the sea that it may depart away before us, and that we may make us more woods. The floods of the sea also in like manner took counsel, and said, Come, let us go up and subdue the woods of the plain, that there also we may make us another country. The thought of the wood was in vain, for the fire came and consumed it. The thought of the floods of the sea came likewise to nought, for the sand stood up and stopped them. If thou wart judge now betwixt these two, whom would thou begin to justify? or whom would thou condemn?
author: Compton Gage

quote: Verily it is a foolish thought that they both have devised, for the ground is given unto the wood, and the sea also had its place to bear its floods.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Thou hast given a right judgment, but why judge thou not thyself also?
author: Compton Gage

quote: For like as the ground is given unto the wood, and the sea to his floods: even so they that dwell upon the earth may understand nothing but that which is upon the earth: and he that dwell above the heavens may only understand the things that are above the height of the heavens.
author: Compton Gage

quote: I beseech thee, O Lord, let me have understanding: For it was not my mind to be curious of the high things, but of such as pass by us daily.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Wherefore the present age is given up as a reproach to the heathen, and for what cause the people whom thou hast loved is given over unto ungodly nations?!
author: Compton Gage

quote: Why the law of our forefathers are brought to nought, and the written covenants come to none effect-
author: Compton Gage

quote: We pass away out of the world as grasshoppers, and our life is astonishment and fear, and we are not worthy to obtain mercy.
author: Compton Gage

quote: What will he then do unto his name whereby we are called? ...of these things have I asked.
author: Compton Gage

quote: The more thou search, the more thou shall marvel.
author: Compton Gage

quote: The more thou search, the more thou shall marvel; for the world hast fast to pass away-
author: Compton Gage

quote: The world hast fast to pass away- And cannot comprehend the things that are promised to the righteous in time to come: for this world is full of unrighteousness and infirmities.
author: Compton Gage

quote: As concerning the things whereof thou asked me, I will tell thee; for the evil is sown, but the destruction thereof is not yet come.
author: Compton Gage

quote: If therefore that which is sown be not turned upside down, and if the place where the evil is sown passes not away, then cannot it come that is sown with good?
author: Compton Gage

quote: The grain of evil seed had been sown in the heart of Adam from the beginning, and how much ungodliness had it brought up unto this time? and how much shall it yet bring forth until the time of threshing come?
author: Compton Gage

quote: Ponder now by thyself, how great fruit of wickedness the grain of evil seed had brought forth. And when the ears shall be cut down, which are without number, how great a floor shall they fill?
author: Compton Gage

quote: How, and when shall these things come to pass? wherefore are our years few and evil?
author: Compton Gage

quote: Do not thou hasten above the most Highest: for thy haste is in vain to be above him, for thou hast much exceeded.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Did not the souls also of the righteous ask question of these things in their chambers, saying, "How long shall I hope on this fashion?" when cometh the fruit of the floor of our reward?
author: Compton Gage

quote: O Lord that bear rule, even we all are full of impiety. And for our sakes peradventure it is that the floors of the righteous are not filled, because of the sins of them that dwell upon the earth.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Go thy way to a woman with child, and ask of her when she had fulfilled her nine months, if her womb may keep the birth any longer within her.
author: Compton Gage

quote: In the grave the chambers of souls are like the womb of a woman: For like as a woman that travails make haste to escape the necessity of the travail: even so do these places haste to deliver those things that are committed unto them.
author: Compton Gage

quote: From the beginning, look, what thou desires to see, it shall be shew thee.
author: Compton Gage

quote: If I have found favor in thy sight, and if it be possible, and if I be meet therefore, shew me then whether there be more to come than is past, or more past than is to come.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Place yourself in the middle of the stream of power and wisdom which animates all whom it floats, and you are without effort impelled to truth, to right and a perfect contentment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson, Spiritual Laws

quote: When one grows older one learns that happiness—complete and unadulterated happiness—comes only in moments, and must be recognized and savored to the full, for even in the happiest life, the complete joy is not always present.
author: Victoria Holt, The Legend of the Seventh Virgin

quote: So treasure your moments of happiness, the glimpses you see of truth, the nights you've been loved. That's all you've got.
author: Fay Weldon, Female Friends

quote: Happiness thinks only of itself.
author: Raymond Radiguet, The Devil in the Flesh

quote: Happy people tend to be those who take pleasure in simple things.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Love wins when reflections win over reflexes.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, Feelings Undefined: The Charm of the Unsaid

quote: In the end, you will realize most friendship is feigning, most loving mere folly.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, Feelings Undefined: The Charm of the Unsaid

quote: Happiness changes the way you see the world.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Happiness is the primary goal of human existence.
author: Joey Lawsin

quote: This life-enhancing, happiness-inducing miracle drug that does, in fact, ruthlessly kill its enemies—you’ve guessed it—is gratitude.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: But that’s the way life is; felicity and expiation play together in the narrow lanes of life like bosom friends, inseparable. You find one, and the other is always around the corner.
author: Anurag Shourie, Half A Shadow

quote: Be open about your thoughts, ideas, and desires and you will be right with your decisions.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Where Love Leads, Hatred Cannot Follow.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Happiness is long-lasting, a condition of the soul, the foundation on which the circumstances of life are experienced, endured, or enjoyed.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Happiness is the condition of who we are and how we think and what we believe and how we live.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Gratitude changes us.
author: Auliq Ice, The Secret of Greatness

quote: Life, is a chess game you win or loose, but just keep playing.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Where there is love, things roll.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: I'd learned more about her in that exhausted, murmuring hour than in all the many months before it. Lovers find their way by such insights and confidences: they're the stars we use to navigate the ocean of desire. And the brightest of those stars are the heartbreaks and sorrows. The most precious gift you can bring to your lover is your suffering. So I took each sadness she confessed to me, and pinned it to the sky.
author: Gregory David Roberts, Shantaram

quote: You either bend, or you break. Suppress your ego to stay happy.
author: Manoj Arora, Happiness Unlimited: How to be happy always

quote: The greatest futility! says the congregator, "The greatest futility! Everything is futile!" What does a person gain from all his hard work- At which he toils under the sun? A generation goes and another cometh forth, but the earth remains the same.
author: Compton Gage

quote: As thou know not what is the way of the spirit, nor how the bones do grow in the womb of her that is with child: even so thou know not the works of what makes all.
author: Compton Gage

quote: In the morning sow thy seed, and in the evening withhold not thine hand: for thou know not whether shall prosper, either this or that, or whether they both shall be alike good.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Truly the light is sweet, and a pleasant thing it is for the eyes to behold the sun: But if a man live many years, and rejoice in them all; yet let him remember the days of darkness; for they shall be many. And all that cometh is vanity.
author: Compton Gage

quote: These be they that have put off the mortal clothing, and put on the immortal, and have confessed the name of God: now are they crowned, and receive palms.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Go thy way, and tell my people, the people of thy Lord God what manner of things, and how great wonders of the Lord thy God, thou hast seen.
author: Compton Gage

quote: And yet their reward appear not, and their labor had no fruit: for I have gone here and there through the heathen, and I see that they flow in wealth, and think not upon thy commandments.
author: Compton Gage

quote: Weigh thou therefore their wickedness now in the balance, and theirs also that dwell the world; and so shall thy name no where be found anymore.
author: Compton Gage

quote: When was it that they who dwell upon the earth have not sinned in thy sight? or what people have so kept thy commandments? Thou shall find that you all by name had kept thy precepts
author: but not the heathen.

quote: Thy heart had gone too far in this world, and think thou to comprehend the way of the most High?
author: Compton Gage

quote: The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow.
author: Aaron Lauritsen, 100 Days Drive: The Great North American Road Trip

quote: Those who achieve the extraordinary are usually the most ordinary because they have nothing to prove to anybody. Be Humble.
author: Aaron Lauritsen, 100 Days Drive: The Great North American Road Trip

quote: It's in those quiet little towns, at the edge of the world, that you will find the salt of the earth people who make you feel right at home.
author: Aaron Lauritsen, 100 Days Drive: The Great North American Road Trip

quote: There's just so much to live for.
author: Alex George, Setting Free the Kites

quote: A little bit closer to the stars, anything seemed possible.
author: Heather Demetrios, I'll Meet You There

quote: The world is perfect, and at the same time, it is in a constant state of unfolding. This is also true for you and me. Our quest for enlightenment is really just a re-connection with something that already exists in us.
author: Victor Shamas

quote: The secret to a happy life is simply your attitude.
author: Gloria Tesch

quote: Best Way to Stay Happy is to be busy.
author: Dipika Agarwal

quote: One has to learn contentment, forgiveness, and purpose on her own before the universe allows her to share her happiness with another soul.
author: Benyf, 11.11.11 After so Many Years of Tears: Letters to My Distant Soul-Mate

quote: This is the secret of happiness that you have been looking for:If you are moving in the direction of your identified desires, you're happy in this moment.If you're moving in opposition to your identified desires, you are unhappy in this moment.
author: Abraham Hicks

quote: Happy people is a great hope to all the unhappy people because a path of success can always be used by the people who couldn’t find such a path yet!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Acceptance is an important part of serenity. It is not enough, however, simply to accept the things we cannot change. For me, serenity comes from not having any investment in the outcome. If I am genuinely serene, then it will not matter to me whether things change or stay the same. Either way, I choose to be happy.
author: Victor Shamas, The Chanters Guide: Sacred Chanting as a Shamanic Practice

quote: The sacred h”s : hope, happiness and health.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Happiness is health
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Count your blessings as the more you are grateful for what you have the more there is to be grateful for.
author: Pravin Agarwal

quote: Sometimes you have to create your own sunshine.
author: Sam Sundquist

quote: Happiness is not a thing - it is a feeling
author: a way of joyful living and being. It comes from inner fulfilment and appreciating the world you live in.

quote: you don't have to be happy to spread happiness.
author: Naresh Soni

quote: Miles and miles of smiles illustrated by the gratitude that creates them
author: Paul Bradley Smith

quote: Your life - and all lives - will be richer if lived with a open, loving heart rather than a closed, fearful mind
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: When people use you, it does not feel very good. But when God uses you for His purpose, it's the greatest feeling in the world!
author: Jen Selinsky

quote: When people use you, it does not feel very good. But when God uses you for His purpose, it's the gretest feeling in the world!
author: Jen Selinsky

quote: Alone, we are great, but together, we are better.
author: Izey Victoria Odiase

quote: Health and happiness are the two most precious and elusive of human conditions. At their core, they are one and the same. Both are a function of balance.
author: Victor Shamas, The Way of Play: Reclaiming Divine Fun & Celebration

quote: before destroying ,please create one same
author: litymunshi

quote: - Chodź, Słoniczko, mam Ci coś ważnego do powiedzenia - powiedziała Mama-słoń pewnego razu, gdy pod wieczór pomarańczowe słońce wtapiało się w pomarańczową pustynię, a stado szarych słoni w szarym zmierzchu wyglądało jak stado cieni. - Jeżeli będziesz sama, moja Słoniczko, to w chwili uniesienia i serdecznej radości pamiętaj zawsze owinąć trąbę wokół czegoś, co jest bardzo ciężkie: wokół rosłej palmy albo ogromnego głazu, tak abyś nie odfrunęła do gwiazd. Kiedy natomiast, słuchaj, Kochanie, uważnie, poczujesz, że jest Ci bardzo ciężko i bardzo jesteś nieszczęśliwa, to rozłóż cztery łapki na boki - wtedy piaski pustyni nie pochłoną Cię tak łatwo - i staraj się sobie przypomnieć, jak to było kiedyś, gdy jak balonik unosiłaś się nad światem.
author: Joanna Klara Teske, Wschód i zachód słonia

quote: I have attended weddings, with chipped nail paints.I have worn same blue denim for days in a row.I have not followed etiquette sometimes, I was too happy to bother.I have picked up fights, ugly ones too.I have been notorious because I stood up for myself.I have flaws. I am flawed.But I have come to realize,It’s okay to life a life others don’t understand.My life should be my LIBERATION,Not anyone’s REGULATION.
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: Being grateful for what you have is the key to peace and happiness.
author: Pravin Agarwal

quote: Even though I knew this might end in heartbreak, that he might make my life scary and complicated and unpredictable, I knew I couldn't let him walk away. Because I knew he'd also make my life happy and comforting and full.
author: Kasie West, By Your Side

quote: If you think only sunshine brings you happiness, then you have not danced in the rain
author: Unknown

quote: The flower replied: you fool! Do you imagine I blossom in order to be seen? I blossom for my own sake because it pleases me, not for the sake of others. My joy consists in my being and my blossoming.
author: Irvin Yalom

quote: Follow your heart, there lies your happiness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Let the song in your heart makes you happy.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Happiness is a spiritual dimension; therefore its source should also be spiritual, not material.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Sadly a pinch of happiness is not sold in markets.
author: Alamvusha

quote: Happiness happens when you have a bigger purpose than having more fulfills, which is why we say happiness happens on the way to fulfillment.
author: Gary Keller, The One Thing: The Surprisingly Simple Truth Behind Extraordinary Results

quote: Wrath held her even closer, right to his beating chest. “. . . a son?” “Yes. A son.” All of a sudden, he felt the biggest, widest, happiest grin hit his face, the g*dd*mn thing stretching his cheeks until they hurt, making his eyes water from the strain, pulling at his temples until they burned. And the joy wasn’t just on his puss. A flush so great it burned him alive flooded through his body, cleansing him in places he didn’t know were dirty, washing out cobwebs that had crept into his corners, making him feel alive in a way he hadn’t been in a very, very long time. Before he knew what he was doing, he burst to his feet with Beth in his arms, leaned back, and hollered at the top of his lungs, with more pride than his six-foot-nine frame could hold. “A soooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooon! I’m having a soooooooooooooooooooooooon!”-Wrath & Beth
author: J.R. Ward, The King

quote: Happiness is a choice. It's not always easy, but is IS always worth it.
author: Lorri Faye

quote: Have you ever thought; whilst looking all this time for the magic in the world, it's been inside you all along? No matter how far you travel, how wide you spread your wings and learn to fly if you have no idea what treasures hide within you you'll be searching your entire life.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: A smile is a smile.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The next time you feel really good, just keep feeling that way for the rest of your life.
author: Donny Miller, Beautiful People with Beautiful Feelings

quote: Money can make life comfortable, solve some problems and bring temporary satisfaction, but true happiness and joy is not guaranteed by money.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There's an inexplicable joy that exists on a brown child's face and in the way they navigate their world long before they discover they're hated.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: Ah! candid and unadulterated mind! you have learned early to reflect; but take care lest this habit, hitherto so well applied, should totally unfit you for society. It will strew thorns in your path, while other young women of your age seek only flowers. By imagining yourself in the place of others, as you now continually do, you will learn to feel for all the unhappy, or even for those who appear so; whereas it might save a great deal of (for the most part useless) pain, if you could contrive to feel only for yourself.
author: Charlotte Turner Smith, Marchmont

quote: Hope in God makes a happy heart.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Happiness is a spiritual concept and his source is hidden in God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Whoever has money would have realized that it doesn’t bring happiness
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: God is the only source of happiness and money
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Everyone's holding my happiness hostage.
author: Donny Miller, Beautiful People with Beautiful Feelings

quote: To become happy in life you need to master the eleven skills: know your life compass, change your thinking, change your beliefs, accept your limits, take responsibility for your life, use positive language, change your habits, manage negative emotions in a wise way, set compelling goals, master time management and face life challenges
author: Victoria Herocten, Awaken Mega Happiness

quote: Happiness manifest when the ordained is realized
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: She had never been able to stand her husband, though not for one minute in their married life had she permitted this to make her unhappy. Only people who are fond of somebody can ever be unhappy, she had told her daughter before her wedding.
author: Anna Seghers, The Seventh Cross

quote: Happiness Is Dependent Upon Choosing To Function Within The Laws And Principles Of Kingdom Of God
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Laughter Is Created As An Expression Of Happiness And Joy Which Results In Health
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Happiness is happiness
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The melody of music makes my heart merry.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Well, I’d rather be unhappy than have the sort of false, lying happiness you were having here.
author: Aldous Huxley, Brave New World

quote: Never have I seen so many young, privileged, people trying so hard to be happy. There are countless articles written about it, blogs named for it, workshops attending to it. Who ever said we’re supposed to be happy all the time, anyway? We’re not. And the pressure to do so might be what’s making us unhappy to begin with. It’s OK if you’re not completely content with your life twenty-four hours a day. Can you imagine what a boring person you’d be if you were? Going through shit storms, feeling uninspired, hating the way you look and having guilt over not accomplishing enough are just some of the things that make you interesting, relatable and human. Not to mention, if you’re reading this, then you have internet access and if you have internet access, it stands to reason that you have a computer, which makes me think you probably have a place to live, with electricity and plenty of food to eat and clean clothes to wear, which are all things that an enormous amount of people living on the planet today do not have. This is not to say that people shouldn’t strive to better their positions in life, however it seems like so many of us are no longer content with a regular amount of happy, yet dead-set on being maniacally jubilant, all of the time.
author: Kelly Rheel

quote: Laugh every day for five minutes, without any reason, then repeat it for 21 days straight and it will become your habit to do.
author: Catherine B. Roy, Live From Your Heart and Mind: The Secret to the Simplicity of Connecting your Heart and Mind on the Road to Happiness and Success.

quote: You’ll never get what you truly deserve if you remain attached to what you’re supposed to let go of.
author: Genereux Philip

quote: I enjoy the wild things, Call me at 3 am and tell me you're waiting at my door. Give me sunsets in different cities and road trips on dirt tracks not sighted on maps. Whiskey for breakfast & cheap thrills for dinner. Give me happiness in a smile and nothing of certainty but the way we make eachother feel. There so much life in living while you're alive & id give absolutely anything to have it all with you.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: You cannot change the past, but you can make a difference now
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: To be successful, look for the job you will take if you don't need a job
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Happiness is like a ripple. If you're the origin, you will get happiness back with same frequency.
author: saadshah

quote: Be happy, not contented.
author: Biju Paulose

quote: We place artificial demands on ourselves that undermine our happiness. These demands force us to work harder and harder to cross a finish line that keeps moving.
author: Frank Sonnenberg, BookSmart: Hundreds of real-world lessons for success and happiness

quote: Without the 'applied awareness' of the Soul, 'happiness' cannot arise.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Smile is a talent, few don't have.
author: saadshah

quote: The heaven of a grasshopper is the wheat field; the heaven of man is the same place, the very earth itself where we get our food and build our happiness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Emotions are the road signs to your happiness.
author: Sam Owen, 500 Relationships And Life Quotes: Bite-Sized Advice For Busy People

quote: All the hungers we have for love, for union, for happiness are given by God to lead us to him. The difference between a saint and the greatest sinner is where they go to satisfy that hunger.
author: Christopher West

quote: May your heart be filled with happiness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I'm not a puzzle piece to someone else's puzzle, I'm my own puzzle that is still growing. I'm unsure of what it'll look like when it's done, but it will be uniquely me.
author: Macy Niichel

quote: I’m feeling really hopeful about it, like maybe I actually have a chance to get better. To be happy. It’s funny, I just realized that my whole life, the whole time I’ve been trying to be perfect, I never once considered happiness as part of the equation. I guess it seemed so impossible I couldn’t even let myself fantasize about it. But now, I don’t know, things feel different somehow. Like impossible things might not be so impossible.
author: Amy Reed, Clean

quote: The air was swollen with music, shouting, and something I could not quite place- a feeling of happiness, but happiness with an edge, a sense of joy that was all the more meaningful because it was so fleeting.
author: Chelsey Philpot, Even in Paradise

quote: If people read poetry, they would be happier.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Enjoy time of existence.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If we read the Scriptures, God will shine in our heart.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Do not delay your happiness, be glad in the moment.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When you decide to move on, you leave a piece of yourself inside them.Unknowingly.So smile.Smile, because with that piece you've beautified something that broke you.☺ Pat yourself, you've contributed to the universe!
author: Shonali Dey

quote: If someone says, "the Gnani Purush is happy in the 'Real' but happy or unhappy in the 'relative’", then I would say, "No, the Gnani Purush Knows the 'relative' as being the 'relative', and therefore He is happy in the relative as well.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Shrieking Brooke’s name as loudly as I could, out in the corridor, I brought her running quickly to my room.‘What’s happened, what’s wrong?’ she immediately cried concerned, legging it up the stairs two at a time. She appeared breathless outside the kitchen door. Brian appeared sleepily at his door too, awoken by the noise, and watched us.‘She’s moving,’ I cried.‘What? Flutters like before?’‘No more, here feel.’ I grabbed her hand and pushed it down onto myexposed belly. Brian averted his eyes as I stood, belly out and top up over my bra, in the middle of the corridor.‘I can’t push you that hard,’ she exclaimed, pulling back her fingers surprised. ‘It will hurt you, or her, I can’t do that.’‘Yes, you can,’ I insisted. ‘You won’t hurt us.’ I pulled her hand back and pushed her long fingers into my belly and we stood waiting, hardly daring to breathe. You kicked again, hard into my side, under Brooke’s long pink fingernails. Brooke jumped away from me in shock and then burst out laughing. She clapped her hands together delighted.‘Well?’ I asked her.‘She kicked me,’ Brooke shrieked still jumping up and down clapping. ‘She kicked me. That was amazing, let me do it again.’ She came back over towards me slowly. Cautiously she pushed her fingers into the same spot on my side. We waited again in silence and I saw her face slightly drop as the seconds ticked by.‘Ah it works,’ she yelled, as again she jumped back shocked as the tiny little feet thudded from my insides at her hand. ‘I love it. Do it again.’ I laughed and then Brian stepped forward.‘Can I have a go?’ he asked quietly, fiddling with his hands and stepping out of his room towards us.‘Of course you can, come here.’And that is how we spent the next few minutes out in the corridor by the kitchen, shrieking, whooping, and jumping around. If anyone had been in the house, I know they would probably have thought we were all mad. Mad, no. Thrilled and excited, most definitely.Baby girl, you did that to us. Thank you.
author: Emily  Williams, Letters to Eloise

quote: There is neither happiness nor misery in the world; there is only the comparison of one state with another, nothing more.
author: Alexandre Dumas, The Count of Monte Cristo

quote: Gnani’ [the englightened one] gives freedom from all sufferings. Outside [world] reigns the cycle of antagonistic [painful] times, Kaliyug. On the contrary, it will even take away whatever happiness you may have.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Her question was clear-“Father, where does the Loss reside?”In the sighs?Cheeks with tears wiped?A lost appetite?Owning a room confined?Or in the smiles all falsified?Thus, the Father decide,It is no matter to hide, he replied-“I think its deep inside,Probably,In the layers of your soul,Where the body provides it,Ample food to be-Magnified, multiplied, intensified.But once you clarify,That its not to be occupied inside,It starves of supplies,And dies.So child, when there is loss,Make sure you refuse to invite it inward, And absolutely never make it your lifelong parasite.
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: She looked down at her bulging veins and she remembered the most important thing that she had forgotten – she was alive.
author: S.R. Crawford, From My Suffering: 25 Ways to Break the Chains of Anxiety, Depression & Stress

quote: It is very sad that most of us just aren’t grateful for what we have. If you’re reading this, I think it’s safe to assume that you’re not homeless. You’re not blind. You might be ill, but you’re still alive. And yet, we find it hard to be thankful. To see the gift each day brings us. It is from this lack of true gratitude that we become sad. We have told ourselves over and over that we aren’t happy. That our lives aren’t good. That we’re no good.
author: S.R. Crawford, From My Suffering: 25 Ways to Break the Chains of Anxiety, Depression & Stress

quote: La felicità non consiste nel mettersi al riparo dalla sofferenza, ma di integrarla al tessuto della nostra esistenza.
author: Éric-Emmanuel Schmitt, Invisible Love

quote: Remember your connection with the cosmos. Remember your connection with the infinity and that remembrance will give you the freedom.
author: Amit Ray, Enlightenment Step by Step

quote: Love, they said, burns youand builds you.But with you, there’s no ash.Just light.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Happiness will be fleeting if you constantly search for it in places that can be taken away. It's an inside job.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Find your happiness before the music of this world falls on deaf ears.
author: Saim .A. Cheeda

quote: Sam woke to a feeling of utter, profound, incredible relief.He closed his eyes as soon as he opened them, afraid that being awake would just invite something terrible to appear.Astrid was back. And she was asleep with her head on his arm. His arm was asleep, completely numb, but as long as that blond head was right there his arm could stay numb.She smelled like pine trees and campfire smoke.He opened his eyes, cautious, almost flinching, because the FAYZ didn’t make a habit of allowing him pure, undiluted happiness. The FAYZ made a habit of stomping on anything that looked even a little bit like happiness. And this level of happiness was surely tempting retaliation. From this high up the fall could be a long, long one.
author: Michael  Grant, Fear

quote: Every person has his secret; in reverie, unbeknown to others, he finds peace, freedom, sorrow and love.
author: Abhysheq Shukla, Feelings Undefined: The Charm of the Unsaid

quote: It takes a lot of courage to be happy.
author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati, First Breath, Last Breath

quote: The unhappy people of the known paths must certainly try the unknown paths in their search of happiness!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Set as higher dimensional beings walking the earth today, who must INcarnate (there is no REincarnation if there is no time. Exception: descending spirals which crystallize in lower frequencies) to live in the various dream worlds (this one included) with the final "kick"/baptism by water, pulling up ALL the densities/dimensions through LOVE.
author: Compton Gage, Devil's Inception

quote: This is just a brief "off the top of the head" first blush analysis, and if one wanted to dig deeper, it wouldn't be difficult to discover more "gems" hidden in plain sight.Devil's Inception!
author: Compton Gage, Devil's Inception

quote: We are bound in honor to strive to bring ever nearer the day when, as far is humanly possible, we shall be able to realize the ideal that each man shall have an equal opportunity to show the stuff that is in him by the way in which he renders service.
author: Theodore Roosevelt, The Man in the Arena: Selected Writings

quote: Often we imagine that we will work hard until we arrive at some distant goal, and then we will be happy. This is a delusion. Happiness is the result of a life lived with purpose. Happiness is not an objective. It is the movement of life itself, a process, and an activity. It arises from curiosity and discovery. Seek pleasure and you will quickly discover the shortest path to suffering. Other people, friends, brothers, sisters, neighbors, spouses, even your mother and I are not responsible for your happiness. Your life is your responsibility, and you always have the choice to do your best. Doing your best will bring happiness. Do not be overconcerned with avoiding pain or seeking pleasure. If you are concentrating on the results of your actions, you are not dedicated to your task.
author: Ethan Hawke, Rules for a Knight

quote: Happy Mind, Happy Home
author: Napa Kettle

quote: Maybe that was the secret to happiness, I thought, being free of the responsibility of yourself.
author: Alexandra Kleeman, You Too Can Have a Body Like Mine

quote: The "inner circle of humanity" recognizes others through frequency, regardless of walk of life or "positioning in the astral". This is an operation run invisibly from Outside the astral. Going Home represents the final shift to one's true spiritual families of light, in all dimensions of harmonics; higher vibrations/love in unity consciousness, above, below and literally "everywhere and everynow".
author: Compton Gage, Devil's Inception

quote: Knowing that you can endure a very difficult challenge offers a degree of confidence that the next challenge can also be endured.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: Happiness softens trials, changes perspective, elevates attitudes, focuses attention, redirects negativity, empowers us to see more clearly, and expands, widens, lifts, ennobles and deepens the sense of meaning and purpose we discover in life.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: There’s less need to slowly acclimate these guys to the tank,” Bailey said. “They’ll be food pretty soon, so their happiness is less important than the shark’s.
author: Dave Eggers, The Circle

quote: Social media allows us to subjugate feelings and problems we don't want to confront, like emotional eating or substance abuse, thus perpetuating our problems and delaying our happiness.
author: Sam Owen, 500 Relationships And Life Quotes: Bite-Sized Advice For Busy People

quote: The past, the present, the future –The floodgates of time wait for Her footsteps Yet She resides forever –In the shape of a rising dawn,In the sound of a humming bee,In the chirping of a flying bird,In the birth of a newborn,In the blissful serenity of Nature;For Happiness is but a reflection of simplicity.
author: Debatrayee Banerjee, A Whispering Leaf. . .

quote: We create excuses that stand between us and other people
author: excuses that separate us from the happiness and the prospects these people can present.

quote: Secret glances are shared by those on the "inside" or esoteric "inner circle", who have literally gone into many lower frequencies simultaneously. This is the "secret glance" of love, which allows the higher to operate in the lower; to "save" those worlds in order to correct the impending takeover of the "Devil and his demons", a metaphor for light and dark "battles" raging today.
author: Compton Gage, Devil's Inception

quote: If the 4th "dimension" is blocked, which is a kind of cosmic umbrella, through which 5D through 9D and higher are designed to operate in physical realms, being non-physical, then the Devil who controls "the spice" controls everything. It would be easy to continue with the reasons behind death, terrible plague on earth.
author: Compton Gage, Devil's Inception

quote: The concept that man is not awake, and that only a fully conscious being can "do", have will and not be subject to the law of accident.
author: Compton Gage, Devil's Inception

quote: This is the vital difference between Conscious Beings, which we are morphing into organically, and those who are asleep or unconscious.
author: Compton Gage, Devil's Inception

quote: Slightly higher density polarized negative entities", regardless of their actual metaphoric names. What's in a name... a rose still has thorns!
author: Compton Gage, Devil's Inception

quote: It's like getting an extraordinary meal after you've been eating junk food for a long time. The taste just sweeps through your sensibilities, bringing all-out contentment, and the sheer goodness of it makes up for every bad meal you ever had.
author: Joan Bauer, Hope Was Here

quote: The best place to conceal esoteric information is right in front of us.
author: Compton Gage, Devil's Inception

quote: A terrible plague has either killed mankind or transformed them into demons ... and all they want is Compton's soul.The best place to conceal esoteric information is right in front of us.
author: Compton Gage, Devil's Inception

quote: He's like a drug for you, Bella.
author: Stephenie Meyer, Eclipse

quote: There is no pretending," Jace said with absolute clarity. "I love you, and I will love you until I die, and if there is life after that, I'll love you then.
author: Cassandra Clare, City of Glass

quote: You can't force love, I realized. It's there or it isn't. If it's not there, you've got to be able to admit it. If it is there, you've got to do whatever it takes to protect the ones you love.
author: Richelle Mead, Frostbite

quote: And I'm suppose to sit by while you date boys and fall in love with someone else, get married...?" His voice tightened. "And meanwhile, I'll die a little bit more every day, watching.
author: Cassandra Clare, City of Glass

quote: If music be the food of love, play on,Give me excess of it; that surfeiting,The appetite may sicken, and so die.
author: William Shakespeare, Twelfth Night
